featured.text: However, since it kept orbiting around the Earth without any consequences, scientists became increasingly comfortable abandoning things that no longer served any useful purpose in space.
It is estimated that there are currently over 500,000 pieces of man-made trash orbiting the Earth at speeds of up to 17,500 miles per hour.

definition.zh_def: 天體圍繞另一天體運行的軌道。
definition.en_def: The curved path of a celestial object or spacecraft around a star, planet, or moon.
definition.example: The Earth travels in an orbit around the Sun.
